\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003eLife at Capgemini is dynamic and fun, a place where people love to work. \u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003eA career at Capgemini is rewarding and constantly transforming. Here are the top ten reasons why people love working at Capgemini.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r

\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e\u003cspan style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003e1. \u003cp class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;"\u003e\u003cspan style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003cspan lang="EN-AU" style="mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri;"\u003eCh\u0026uacute;ng t\u0026ocirc;i ƒëang b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu m·ªôt s·ª± kh·ªüi ƒë·ªông t·∫°i ACB ƒë·ªÉ ph·ª•c v·ª• h\u0026agrave;ng tri·ªáu kh\u0026aacute;ch h\u0026agrave;ng c·ªßa ch\u0026uacute;ng ta. Ch\u0026uacute;ng t\u0026ocirc;i ƒëang t\u0026igrave;m ki·∫øm c\u0026aacute;c t\u0026agrave;i nƒÉng ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát ƒë·ªÉ th\u0026uacute;c ƒë·∫©y tƒÉng tr∆∞·ªüng. Vi·ªác ƒë·ªãnh h\u0026igrave;nh ƒë·ªôi ng≈© qu·∫£n l\u0026yacute;\u003cspan style="mso-spacerun: yes;"\u003e\u0026nbsp; \u003c/span\u003es·∫Ω cung c·∫•p c\u0026aacute;c d·ªãch v·ª• c\u0026ocirc;ng ngh·ªá h\u0026agrave;ng ƒë·∫ßu th·∫ø gi·ªõi ƒë·ªÉ thu h\u0026uacute;t ƒë∆∞·ª£c h\u0026agrave;ng tri·ªáu kh\u0026aacute;ch h\u0026agrave;ng ti·∫øp theo.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r
\u003cp class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;"\u003e\u003cspan lang="EN-AU" style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003eWe\u0026rsquo;re thinkers and doers, and like people who can be both player and coach. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r
\u003cp class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;"\u003e\u003cspan style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003cspan lang="EN-AU" style="mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri;"\u003eCh\u0026uacute;ng t\u0026ocirc;i l\u0026agrave; c\u0026aacute;c nh\u0026agrave; nghƒ© ra \u0026yacute; t∆∞·ªüng v\u0026agrave; c≈©ng l\u0026agrave; ng∆∞·ªùi th·ª±c hi·ªán, v\u0026agrave; gi·ªëng nh∆∞ nh·ªØng ng∆∞·ªùi kh\u0026aacute;c c\u0026oacute; th·ªÉ v·ª´a l\u0026agrave; ng∆∞·ªùi tham gia ch∆°i v·ª´a l\u0026agrave; hu·∫•n luy·ªán vi\u0026ecirc;n.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r
\u003cp class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;"\u003e\u003cspan lang="EN-AU" style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003eAs one of the largest consumer banks in Asia, we\u0026rsquo;re investing in the leading people, technologies and practices to improve each customer\u0026rsquo;s financial lives. \u003cp class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;"\u003e\u003cspan style="font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;"\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003cspan lang="EN-AU" style="mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri;"\u003eL\u0026agrave; m·ªôt trong nh·ªØng ng\u0026acirc;n h\u0026agrave;ng TMCP l·ªõn nh·∫•t ·ªü ch\u0026acirc;u \u0026Aacute;, ch\u0026uacute;ng t\u0026ocirc;i ƒëang ƒë·∫ßu t∆∞ v\u0026agrave;o ƒë·ªôi ng≈© nh\u0026acirc;n s·ª±, th·ª±c h\u0026agrave;nh v\u0026agrave; c\u0026ocirc;ng ngh·ªá h\u0026agrave;ng ƒë·∫ßu ƒë·ªÉ c·∫£i thi·ªán ƒë·ªùi s·ªëng t\u0026agrave;i ch\u0026iacute;nh c·ªßa kh\u0026aacute;ch h\u0026agrave;ng. \u003cp style="text-align: justify;"\u003e\u003cb\u003ePython\u003c/b\u003e\u003cspan style="font-weight: 400;"\u003e l√† m·ªôt ng√¥n ng·ªØ l·∫≠p tr√¨nh b·∫≠c cao, m√£ ngu·ªìn m·ªü ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng r·ªông r√£i trong nhi·ªÅu lƒ©nh v·ª±c kh√°c nhau, v√¨ th·∫ø m√† nhu c·∫ßu h·ªçc ƒë·ªÉ tr·ªü th√†nh l·∫≠p tr√¨nh vi√™n Python ng√†y c√†ng l·ªõn. ƒê·ªÉ h·ªçc b·∫•t c·ª© ng√¥n ng·ªØ l·∫≠p tr√¨nh n√†o th√¨ vi·ªác t·ªëi quan tr·ªçng l√† c·∫ßn ph·∫£i th·ª±c h√†nh nhi·ªÅu nh·∫•t c√≥ th·ªÉ. \u003cp style="text-align: justify;"\u003ePandas t√≠ch h·ª£p t·ªët v·ªõi th∆∞ vi·ªán¬†\u003cstrong\u003eMatplotlib\u003c/strong\u003e ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì. V√≠ d·ª•, ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ t·∫°o bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì th·ªÉ hi·ªán ƒëi·ªÉm s·ªë c·ªßa t·ª´ng ng∆∞·ªùi:\u003c/p\u003e\r

\u003cpre\u003e\u003cspan class="enlighter-k0"\u003eimport\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class="enlighter-text"\u003e matplotlib.pyplot \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class="enlighter-k0"\u003eas\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class="enlighter-text"\u003e plt\u003c/span\u003e\r

\u003cp style="text-align: justify;"\u003e\u003cspan style="font-weight: 400;"\u003eTuy nhi√™n, v√¨ x·ª≠ l√Ω ph·ª©c t·∫°p n√™n v·ªÅ m·∫∑t hi·ªáu nƒÉng, h√†m \u003c/span\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003ci\u003ere.sub\u003c/i\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cspan style="font-weight: 400;"\u003e s·∫Ω ch·∫°y ch·∫≠m h∆°n t∆∞∆°ng ƒë·ªëi so v·ªõi ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c \u003c/span\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003ci\u003ereplace\u003c/i\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cspan style="font-weight: 400;"\u003e. V√¨ v·∫≠y trong h·∫ßu h·∫øt c√°c b√†i to√°n thay th·∫ø chu·ªói ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n th√¨ \u003c/span\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003ci\u003ereplace\u003c/i\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cspan style="font-weight: 400;"\u003e v·∫´n n√™n ∆∞u ti√™n ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng. H√£y ch·ªâ c√¢n nh·∫Øc s·ª≠ d·ª•ng \u003c/span\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003ci\u003ere.sub\u003c/i\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cspan style="font-weight: 400;"\u003e khi y√™u c·∫ßu b√†i to√°n c·ªßa b·∫°n c·∫ßn nh·ªØng t√≠nh nƒÉng thay th·∫ø chu·ªói ph·ª©c t·∫°p h∆°n, tr√°nh vi·ªác l√£ng ph√≠ t√†i nguy√™n kh√¥ng c·∫ßn thi·∫øt trong ch∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r

\u003ch2\u003eH∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Trello chi ti·∫øt\u003c/h2\u003e\r

\u003ch2\u003e·ª®ng d·ª•ng c·ªßa ng√¥n ng·ªØ R\u003c/h2\u003e\r
